title: What to do about SQLITE_BUSY errors despite setting a timeout
summary:
So I’m a huge SQLite fanboy and I use it for almost everything these days. Recently, the project added sqlite3_rsync which allows you to swiftly replicate your database to other servers (or to the same server if you want), and this really was the cherry on top for me.
Last week however, I ran into one of my projects unexpectedly getting SQLITE_BUSY errors. And then someone urged me to run ‘a real database’ (PostgreSQL), and that hurt.
